org.dita.dost

Class Processor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dita.dost.Processor

  • public final class Processor
extends java.lang.Object
    DITA-OT processer. Not thread-safe, but can be reused.

      • createDebugLog

        public Processor createDebugLog(boolean createDebugLog)

        Parameters:

        this Process object
